alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Brazoria Islands; Chambers; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 8:28AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southwestern Chambers Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 827 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Marque, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... League City, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, southwestern Friendswood, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Hitchcock, Kemah, Galveston Pier 21, Bayou Vista, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Hillcrest, San Leon, Scholes Field, Port Bolivar and Offatts Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
